list.name: Changes
list.comment: #fix #jsx Refactor form inputs, handle state changes, and update data fetching in profile and index components. Update form inputs to handle null values gracefully and add form validation for student information in the profile page.

task.summary: #fix #jsx #api Refactor components to include date pickers and form handling for improved user interaction in the evaluation report component. Refactor components to include date pickers and form handling for improved user interaction in the evaluation report component.
#fix #jsx Refactor components to include date pickers and form handling for improved user interaction in the evaluation report component.
#fix #jsx Update account management slice to include location data and dispatch actions using Redux hooks.
#fix #jsx Refactor file-category component to use new data key "name" instead of "category" and add data fetching logic using useRequestGetQuery.
#fix #jsx Refactor component to utilize new state management and optimize form inputs. Refactor components to include a DatePicker for improved user interaction and form handling.
#fix #jsx Refactor components to include a DatePicker for improved user interaction and form handling.
# fix #jsx Update scheduling components to include dynamic rendering based on the route params for improved user experience.
#fix #jsx Update components to include dynamic rendering based on route params for improved user experience.
#fix #jsx Refactor component render methods to include setting ActionIndex state in index.jsx, fees.jsx, file-category.jsx, management.jsx, packages.jsx, product.jsx, staff.jsx, and workspace.xml.
#fix #jsx Refactor component render methods to include setting ActionIndex state in various files for better code organization.
#fix #jsx Add form validation and input handling for student information in profile page. Refactor form inputs to use Custom Components for improved user interaction.
#fix #jsx Update form inputs to handle null values gracefully and add form validation for student information in the profile page.

#fix #jsx Refactor form inputs, handle state changes, and update data fetching in profile and index components. Update form inputs to handle null values gracefully and add form validation for student information in the profile page.
